title: New: Julio Bashmore â€“ Peppermint (Feat. Jessie Ware)
content:
Summer may be over and the gloomy, unwelcoming nights rapidly creeping in, but this new joint from Julio Bashmore refuses to let the warmer months go.

Peppermint, featuring the vocals of a certain Miss Jessie Ware is a club anthem / pop hit crossover, turn it up loud and pour yourself a drink; this is the sound of many Friday nights to come. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
